Class BlobValue

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.io.InputStream
      • org.postgresql.pljava.jdbc.BlobValue
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, AutoCloseable, Blob
    public class BlobValue
extends InputStream
implements Blob
    Implementation of Blob for the SPI connection.
